channel.title: MongoDB Quickstart on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in MongoDB Quickstart on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: MongoDB Quickstart
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. MongoDB QuickStart This tutorial will show you how to use KubeDB to run a MongoDB database. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster. If you do not already have a cluster, you can create one by using Minikube. Now, install KubeDB cli on your workstation and KubeDB operator in your cluster following the steps here.
